mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kgst.eas_received_info (document_id, user_id, user_name, user_dept_cd, external_org_cd, receive_status, received_dt, checked_dt, accept_dt, reject_dt, reject_detail, received_order, is_external) VALUES (#{documentId}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userDeptCd}, #{externalOrgCd}, #{receiveStatus}, #{receivedDt}, #{checkedDt}, #{acceptDt}, #{rejectDt}, #{rejectDetail}, #{receivedOrder}, #{isExternal})
